blogPosts.header: what’s the best beauty look to wear with a bag?
blogPosts.description: Every color has a personality, an emotion that you channel while wearing it. Red is exciting — a color to evoke your inner daring. Then, there's pink: safe, benign, and obviously pretty. Or is it?
